content: पर्याकुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Turbid, foul (as water). {@--2@} Confused, confounded, frightened; <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Disordered, dishevelled; <ls>Ś. 1. 30.</ls> {@--4@} Excited, agitated, bewildered; पर्याकुलोस्मि <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 22.</ls> {@--5@} Full of, filled with: स्नेह°, क्रोध° &c.
